Class GUI_BankSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • GUI_BankSystem
  • public class GUI_BankSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI of the Bank System
    Contains the home page and 6 function page:
    - Open Account
    - Deposit Funds
    - Clear Funds
    - Withdraw Funds
    - Suspend Account
    - Close Account
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Xi Xia
